leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-单细胞与空间组学生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→整合→聚类/轨迹→注释→可视化→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: R/Python生态 + 交互可视化 + pipelines

queries: [WEB] scATAC-seq and scRNA-seq joint embedding github
[WEB] multi-modal deep learning single cell github

tools.name: loupeR
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for Seurat objects to 10x Genomics Loupe Browser files
tools.detailed_description: A utility package to convert Seurat analysis objects into .cloupe files, enabling interactive visualization of single-cell data in the 10x Genomics Loupe Browser.

tools.name: ceLLama
tools.one_line_profile: Local LLM-based cell type annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging local Large Language Models to perform automated cell type annotation on single-cell RNA-seq data, prioritizing privacy and speed.

tools.name: scrna_seurat_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Seurat-based scRNA-seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A structured pipeline for analyzing single-cell transcriptomics data using Seurat, covering standard processing steps from QC to clustering.

tools.name: Interactive-3D-Plotting-in-Seurat
tools.one_line_profile: 3D visualization extension for Seurat objects
tools.detailed_description: R scripts to generate interactive 3D UMAP and tSNE plots from Seurat-analyzed single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: ArchR
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Regulatory Chromatin in R
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software package for the analysis of single-cell chromatin accessibility (scATAC-seq) data, offering scalable and extensible workflows.

tools.name: CVQVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Representation learning for multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Conditional Vector Quantized Variational Autoencoder (CVQVAE) for integrating multi-omics single-cell data.

tools.name: liger (JEFworks)
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Iterative Gene set Enrichment
tools.detailed_description: An R package for gene set enrichment analysis, developed by JEFworks (Jean Fan Lab). Note: Distinct from the LIGER integration tool.

tools.name: multiview-reconstruction
tools.one_line_profile: Reconstruction software for multi-view microscopy (SPIM)
tools.detailed_description: Software for registering, fusing, and deconvolution of multi-view microscopic acquisitions, specifically designed for Selective Plane Illumination Microscopy (SPIM) data.

tools.name: MultiviewC
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for multiview cattle 3D detection dataset
tools.detailed_description: Codebase for processing and analyzing the MultiviewC dataset, focusing on 3D detection and action recognition in cattle monitoring.

tools.name: bindSC
tools.one_line_profile: Bi-order integration of single-cell multi-omics data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the integration of unpaired single-cell RNA-seq, ATAC-seq, spatial transcriptomics, and CyTOF data using a bi-order canonical correlation analysis approach.

tools.name: StabMap
tools.one_line_profile: Mosaic single cell data integration
tools.detailed_description: A method for integrating single-cell datasets with non-overlapping features (mosaic integration), enabling joint analysis of diverse omics data.

tools.name: muondetector
tools.one_line_profile: Software for Raspberry Pi based muon detector
tools.detailed_description: Data acquisition and processing software for the MuonPi project, designed to detect cosmic ray muons using Raspberry Pi hardware.

tools.name: scMiko
tools.one_line_profile: Extended Seurat framework for scRNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package that extends the Seurat framework with additional visualization and analysis workflows for single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: CyteTypeR
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent LLM cell type annotation
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing multi-agent Large Language Models to automate the annotation of cell types in single-cell RNA-seq datasets.

tools.name: MuDataSeurat
tools.one_line_profile: Interface between .h5mu files and Seurat
tools.detailed_description: Provides functionality to load multimodal .h5mu files (MuData format) into R as Seurat objects, facilitating interoperability between Python (Muon) and R (Seurat) ecosystems.

tools.name: SMGR
tools.one_line_profile: Joint statistical method for single-cell multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: A statistical method for the integrative analysis of single-cell multi-omics data, focusing on identifying regulatory relationships.

tools.name: APackOfTheClones
tools.one_line_profile: Circle-packing visualization for clonal expansion
tools.detailed_description: An R package extending scRepertoire to visualize clonal expansion in single-cell data using circle packing plots, integrating with Seurat objects.

tools.name: MOVE
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Omics Variational autoEncoder
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework using Variational Autoencoders for integrating multi-omics data and identifying cross-modal associations.

tools.name: sc-compReg
tools.one_line_profile: R package for single-cell comparative regulatory analysis
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool designed for performing comparative regulatory analysis on single-cell data, enabling the identification of regulatory differences between conditions or cell types.

tools.name: CiteFuse
tools.one_line_profile: Method for fusion and analysis of CITE-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A computational framework for the integration and analysis of CITE-seq data, facilitating the fusion of transcriptomic and proteomic modalities for improved cell type clustering and identification.

tools.name: MultiMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Dimensionality reduction for integration of single cell multi-omics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the integration of single-cell multi-omics data that preserves the manifold structure of the data, enabling joint visualization and analysis of multiple modalities.

tools.name: GCN-SC
tools.one_line_profile: Graph convolutional networks for single-cell multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: A universal framework leveraging graph convolutional networks (GCN) to integrate single-cell multi-omics data, aiming to capture complex relationships between cells across different modalities.

tools.name: SCOTCH
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell multi-modal integration using Optimal Transport
tools.detailed_description: A method for integrating single-cell multi-modal data that utilizes the Optimal Transport algorithm and a cell matching strategy to align data across different omics layers.

tools.name: scCATCH
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic annotation of cell types for scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the automatic annotation of cell types in single-cell RNA sequencing clusters based on evidence-based score transformation and tissue-specific cell markers.

tools.name: SCopeLoomR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for creating and extending .loom files for SCope
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to create generic .loom files and extend them with additional data such as SCENIC regulons and Seurat clusters, compatible with the SCope visualization platform.

tools.name: SgsAnnDataV2
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for Seurat/Giotto/Signac/ArchR objects to AnnData
tools.detailed_description: A utility package to facilitate the conversion of analysis objects from popular single-cell tools (Seurat, Giotto, Signac, ArchR) into the AnnData format for interoperability.

tools.name: MOFA
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Omics Factor Analysis (R version)
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised framework for the integration of multi-omics data sets, inferring a set of hidden factors that capture biological and technical sources of variability.

tools.name: MOFA2
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Omics Factor Analysis v2 (R version)
tools.detailed_description: The second version of Multi-Omics Factor Analysis (MOFA), providing improved scalability and functionality for integrating multi-modal single-cell and bulk data.

tools.name: mofapy2
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Omics Factor Analysis v2 (Python version)
tools.detailed_description: The Python implementation of MOFA+, enabling multi-omics integration and factor analysis within Python-based workflows.

tools.name: signac-bioturing
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance analytics package for single cell data
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation/optimization of single-cell analytics functionalities, likely designed for high-performance processing of chromatin accessibility and other single-cell data.

tools.name: mLLMCelltype
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-LLM consensus framework for cell type annotation
tools.detailed_description: A framework that leverages multiple Large Language Models (LLMs) to achieve consensus in cell type annotation, improving accuracy over single-model approaches.

tools.name: Mowgli
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell multi-omics integration using Optimal Transport
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for integrating paired single-cell multi-omics data using optimal transport, designed to handle sparsity and noise in single-cell datasets.

tools.name: Seurat-Integrate
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for benchmarking and accessing Seurat integration methods
tools.detailed_description: An R package that expands Seurat's integrative analysis capabilities by providing access to popular integration methods and a benchmarking toolkit.

tools.name: cellranger_cite_hash
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing CITE-seq and cell hashing with Cell Ranger
tools.detailed_description: A workflow/script collection for processing CITE-seq and cell hashing datasets using the Cell Ranger pipeline, facilitating the handling of antibody-derived tags.

tools.name: rPanglaoDB
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for downloading and merging single-cell RNA-seq data from PanglaoDB
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to facilitate the retrieval and integration of labeled single-cell RNA-seq datasets from the PanglaoDB database directly into Seurat objects for downstream analysis.

tools.name: EcoMug
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient Cosmic Muon Generator for high-energy physics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for generating cosmic muon data, used in high-energy physics and astrophysics simulations to model muon flux and interactions.

tools.name: r-seurat-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Seurat wrapper scripts for Bioconda and workflow integration
tools.detailed_description: A collection of R scripts wrapping Seurat functionality to facilitate installation as a Bioconda package and integration into automated bioinformatics workflows (e.g., Galaxy, Snakemake).

tools.name: SCpubr
tools.one_line_profile: Publication-ready visualization tool for single-cell transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides a streamlined interface to generate high-quality, publication-ready plots and visualizations for single-cell RNA-seq data, building upon Seurat and ggplot2.

tools.name: dea_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for differential expression analysis using Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A modular Snakemake workflow designed to perform differential expression analyses (DEA) on multimodal single-cell data, leveraging Seurat's statistical testing frameworks.

tools.name: mixscape_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for CRISPR screen perturbation analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow module for analyzing pooled CRISPR screens with single-cell readouts (scCRISPR-seq), utilizing the Mixscape method within Seurat for perturbation analysis.

tools.name: scrnaseq_processing_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized processing workflow for scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for the preprocessing, quality control, and visualization of single-cell RNA-seq data (10X or MTX format) using Seurat best practices.

tools.name: DR.SC
tools.one_line_profile: Joint dimension reduction and spatial clustering for spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A statistical method and R/C++ package for joint dimension reduction and spatial clustering of single-cell and spatial transcriptomics data, enhancing the identification of spatial domains.

tools.name: GLUE
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-linked unified embedding for multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for integrating single-cell multi-omics data by learning a graph-linked unified embedding, enabling regulatory inference and cross-modal alignment.

tools.name: signac (GlotzerLab)
tools.one_line_profile: Data management framework for computational science simulations
tools.detailed_description: A framework to manage large and heterogeneous data spaces on the file system, specifically designed for computational physics and chemistry simulations (Note: distinct from the bioinformatics tool 'Signac').

tools.name: signac-dashboard
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization dashboard for signac data spaces
tools.detailed_description: A web-based dashboard interface for visualizing and exploring data spaces managed by the signac framework, facilitating analysis of simulation results.

tools.name: signac-flow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management for signac projects
tools.detailed_description: A tool for managing the workflow of computational projects within the signac framework, handling job submission and execution on HPC clusters.

tools.name: PieParty
tools.one_line_profile: Pie chart visualization for cells in UMAP plots
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to visualize single-cell data by representing cells or clusters as pie charts on UMAP embeddings, useful for displaying composition or multi-label data.

tools.name: MultiViewICA
tools.one_line_profile: Independent Component Analysis for multi-view data
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Multi-View Independent Component Analysis (ICA), designed to model shared sources across multiple views or datasets, commonly used in neuroimaging and signal processing.

tools.name: cellxgene_VIP
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and analysis plugin for cellxgene viewer
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for cellxgene that extends its capabilities to generate high-resolution plots (violin, heatmap, volcano, etc.) and perform differential gene expression analysis directly within the interactive viewer.

tools.name: scrnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized workflow for single-cell RNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline/workflow for processing single-cell RNA-seq data using Seurat, facilitating standard analysis steps from quality control to clustering.

tools.name: ChromDragoNN
tools.one_line_profile: Predicts chromatin accessibility from RNA and DNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that integrates regulatory DNA sequence and gene expression data to predict genome-wide chromatin accessibility across different cellular contexts.

tools.name: cirrocumulus
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for large-scale single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool designed to bring single-cell data to life, supporting interactive exploration of large datasets with features like dot plots, heatmaps, and embeddings.

tools.name: Mantid
tools.one_line_profile: Data analysis framework for neutron scattering and muon spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A framework that supports high-performance computing and visualization of scientific data from neutron scattering and muon spectroscopy experiments.

tools.name: SignacX
tools.one_line_profile: Cell type identification tool for scATAC-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for the identification of cell types from single-cell ATAC-seq data, leveraging gene activity scores and reference data.

tools.name: scCross
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for single-cell multi-omics integration and generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based model for the integration, cross-modality generation, and simulation of single-cell multi-omics data, capable of handling in-silico perturbations.

tools.name: ReductionWrappers
tools.one_line_profile: R wrappers for Python dimensionality reduction tools
tools.detailed_description: Provides R wrappers to connect Python-based dimensionality reduction tools (like UMAP, t-SNE implementations) with single-cell data objects in R (Seurat, SingleCellExperiment).

tools.name: seurat-disk
tools.one_line_profile: HDF5 interface for Seurat single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: Provides interfaces for HDF5-based single-cell file formats, enabling Seurat to interact with on-disk datasets like h5Seurat and AnnData.

tools.name: multiview-stitcher
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for stitching large multi-view microscopy images
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for registering, fusing, and stitching large multi-view or multi-positioning image datasets in 2D and 3D, commonly used in microscopy.

tools.name: ArchR-h5ad
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from ArchR Arrow files to AnnData h5ad format
tools.detailed_description: A utility to parse and convert ArchR's Arrow files (used in scATAC-seq analysis) into AnnData h5ad format for compatibility with Python-based tools.

tools.name: NASQAR
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based platform for high-throughput sequencing analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive web-based platform designed for the analysis and visualization of high-throughput sequencing data, including RNA-seq and scRNA-seq.

tools.name: SeuratWizard
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive wizard for Seurat-based analysis
tools.detailed_description: A web-based interactive application that guides users through single-cell RNA-seq data analysis and clustering using the Seurat framework.

tools.name: seuratv3wizard
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive wizard for Seurat v3 analysis
tools.detailed_description: A web-based interactive application specifically designed for performing guided single-cell RNA-seq analysis using Seurat v3.

tools.name: MultiViewNMF
tools.one_line_profile: Partial Multi-View Clustering via Non-negative Matrix Factorization
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Partial Multi-View Clustering using Non-negative Matrix Factorization (NMF), suitable for integrating multi-view data where some views may be incomplete.

tools.name: MultiViz
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization library for multimodal machine learning models
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to visualize and understand the behaviors of multimodal models, providing insights into cross-modal interactions and model decision-making processes.

tools.name: scplotter
tools.one_line_profile: Easy visualization package for single-cell sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: An R package built upon plotthis that provides a set of functions to visualize single-cell sequencing data efficiently, simplifying the creation of complex plots.

tools.name: scPair
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for boosting single cell multimodal analysis using atlases
tools.detailed_description: A method for boosting single cell multimodal analysis by leveraging single cell atlases and implicit feature selection to improve data integration and interpretation.

tools.name: optima
tools.one_line_profile: Integrative analysis tool for Tapestri single-cell multiomics data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for the Tapestri platform to facilitate the integrative analysis of single-cell multiomics data, specifically targeting DNA and protein co-analysis.

tools.name: sciCAN
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of scATAC-seq and scRNA-seq via adversarial networks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the integration of single-cell chromatin accessibility and gene expression data using a cycle-consistent adversarial network (CycleGAN) approach.

tools.name: MOFAcellulaR
tools.one_line_profile: Inference of multicellular programs using Multi-Omics Factor Analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package to infer multicellular programs from single-cell data using Multi-Omics Factor Analysis (MOFA), enabling the discovery of coordinated cellular responses.

tools.name: ArchRAG
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient hierarchical Graph-based Retrieval-Augmented Generation engine
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of a hierarchical Graph-based Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system, designed for efficient information retrieval and generation tasks in AI.

tools.name: muon_fsdp_2
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of the Muon optimizer with FSDP support
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Muon optimizer, integrated with Fully Sharded Data Parallel (FSDP) for efficient training of large-scale AI models.

tools.name: scCustomize
tools.one_line_profile: Custom visualization and analysis functions for Seurat
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing a collection of functions created and curated to aid in the visualization and analysis of single-cell data, extending the capabilities of Seurat.

tools.name: Azimuth
tools.one_line_profile: Web app for reference-based single-cell mapping
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny web application and R package for mapping single-cell datasets to reference atlases using Seurat v4, enabling automated cell type annotation.

tools.name: Seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for single-cell genomics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A leading R toolkit for single-cell genomics, designed for QC, analysis, and exploration of single-cell RNA-seq data, as well as multimodal integration.

tools.name: SeuratData
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset distribution mechanism for Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A mechanism for distributing and loading datasets for the Seurat ecosystem, facilitating access to benchmark single-cell datasets.

tools.name: SeuratWrappers
tools.one_line_profile: Community extensions and wrappers for Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A collection of community-provided extensions and wrappers that integrate other single-cell analysis tools directly into the Seurat workflow.

tools.name: Muon.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia implementation of the Muon multimodal framework
tools.detailed_description: The Julia implementation of the Muon framework, designed for the analysis of multimodal omics data within the Julia ecosystem.

tools.name: mudata
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Multimodal Data (.h5mu) handling
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for handling multimodal data using the .h5mu file format, serving as the data structure backbone for the Muon framework.

tools.name: muon
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for multimodal omics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for multimodal omics analysis, enabling the processing and analysis of data from multiple modalities (e.g., CITE-seq, multiome) in a unified manner.

tools.name: scvi-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Deep probabilistic modeling for single-cell omics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for deep probabilistic analysis of single-cell and spatial omics data, providing tools for dimensionality reduction, integration, and differential expression.

tools.name: Alleloscope
tools.one_line_profile: Allele-specific copy number estimation for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A method for allele-specific copy number estimation applied to single cell DNA and ATAC sequencing data, enabling integrative multi-omic analysis of allele-specific events.

tools.name: CosmicWatch-Desktop-Muon-Detector-v3
tools.one_line_profile: Software and firmware for desktop muon detector hardware
tools.detailed_description: The software and firmware repository for the CosmicWatch Desktop Muon Detector, enabling the recording and analysis of muon flux data for physics experiments.

tools.name: scAI
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised integrative analysis of single-cell multi-omics
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised approach for the integrative analysis of single-cell multi-omics data, capable of decomposing data into biologically relevant factors.

tools.name: tidygate
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive gating and labeling for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: An R package that allows users to interactively gate and label elements within scatter plots, useful for flow cytometry and single-cell data analysis.

tools.name: tidyseurat
tools.one_line_profile: Tidyverse-compatible adapter for Seurat objects
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides a tidyverse-compatible interface for Seurat objects, allowing for fluent data manipulation and visualization of single-cell data.

tools.name: Signac
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis toolkit for single-cell chromatin accessibility
tools.detailed_description: An R toolkit for the analysis of single-cell chromatin data (scATAC-seq), providing functionality for QC, dimensionality reduction, and integration with scRNA-seq.

tools.name: ArchRtoSignac
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from ArchR objects to Signac objects
tools.detailed_description: An R package facilitating the conversion of ArchRProject objects (from ArchR) to SeuratObject objects (for Signac), enabling interoperability between these scATAC-seq tools.

tools.name: Liger-tilelang
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient TileLang kernels for LLM training
tools.detailed_description: A library providing efficient TileLang kernels optimized for Large Language Model (LLM) training, contributing to AI infrastructure and high-performance computing.

tools.name: Seurat.utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utility functions for Seurat v5 analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utility functions to support and extend Seurat v5 single-cell analysis workflows.

tools.name: DALI
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of single-cell TCR/BCR data in Seurat
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the analysis of single-cell T-cell receptor (TCR) and B-cell receptor (BCR) data within the Seurat ecosystem.

tools.name: LIGER
tools.one_line_profile: R package for integrating and analyzing multiple single-cell datasets
tools.detailed_description: LIGER (Linked Inference of Genomic Experimental Relationships) is an R package for integrating and analyzing multiple single-cell datasets, enabling joint analysis of different omics (e.g., scRNA-seq and scATAC-seq) or datasets across conditions.

tools.name: PyLiger
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of LIGER for single-cell multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: PyLiger is the Python port of the LIGER package, providing scalable integration of multiple single-cell datasets via non-negative matrix factorization (NMF).

tools.name: BABEL
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for cross-modality translation in single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: BABEL is a deep learning model that translates between single-cell RNA-seq and ATAC-seq profiles, enabling the inference of one modality from the other to facilitate multi-omic analysis.

tools.name: scMDC
tools.one_line_profile: Deep clustering framework for single-cell multi-omics data
tools.detailed_description: scMDC (Single Cell Multi-omics Deep Clustering) is an end-to-end deep learning framework for clustering single-cell multi-omics data, utilizing autoencoders to learn joint representations.

tools.name: SCP
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive pipeline for single-cell data analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: SCP (Single-Cell Pipeline) is an R-based toolkit designed to facilitate the end-to-end analysis of single-cell data, providing functions for quality control, integration, and advanced visualization.
